name: Cube Trotter
description:
Press WASD to move. Walk to one of the edges and uh, try not to panic! Sound is recommended.

Just noticed the camera is a bit off, sorry! I'll try and fix that tomorrow morning. If you're having a problem, there should be a full screen button that should fix it.

This if the first time in my three years of attempts that I have finished a game jam game. And a game at all for that matter. Please be delicate, I didn't exactly have time for bug testing. I am honestly just so relieved it actually plays in the browser.

All art created by me, within the jam time (except the rocks, i made them previously), with sound effects from various sources that I will add links to in the morning. The code was also created within jam time? I didn't actually expect that one, but I guess it's cool I can create a abomination to the name of coding within that time.
